entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning appears about not specifying self-contained when PublishTrimmed or PublishAot are set #25808
    7.0.1xx
  • Make `Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk` an implicit reference #25797
  • Prevent `dotnet publish` from marking dll files as executable on linux #25778
  • The dotnet publish command using dll timestamp instead of specified version when coping #25776

Closed

  • Add an `-lp` option alias to `dotnet run` for `--launch-profile` #25770
  • AnalysisLevel preview setting is missing tests #25450
    7.0.1xx
  • With .NET SDK 6.0.300-preview.22154.4, warning NETSDK1179 still shows when running "dotnet publish -r win-x64 --self-contained" in CLI #24269
    6.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the RID target from lower macOS to the latest one #25784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test for installing nuget packages ensuring no breaking changes in Nuget #25783
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25781
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add fallback root certificate bundle for code signing and timestamping #25687
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add -lp alias for --launch-profile on dotnet run #25798
    Area-CLI
  • Compatibility tooling refactoring #25765
  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • [main] Integrate dotnet user-jwts tools into SDK #25757
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.1xx-preview5] Integrate new user-jwts tool into SDK #25771
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
